resources.string: KLets - Plugin Pack
Settings
User support
it,en
en
Foursquare
checkin to [place name]

Allows to perform a Foursquare checkin.
 
 Examples:
 "checkin to Pizza Hut!"
The place to checkin
Pizza Hut
Please, tell me the place name.
en
Sorry, in order to checkin to a venue, you first need to connect this plugin to Foursquare.
Sorry, in order to checkin to a venue, you need to enable the GPS.
Sorry, an error occurred while performing the Foursquare command. Action aborted.
Sorry, an unexpected Foursquare error occurred. Plase try again later.
Sorry, but Foursquare connection authorization has been expired. You need to re-connect this plugin to Foursquare to perform the requested command.
Checkin to \'%1$s\' performed successfully.
I found %1$s venues into foursquare. Tell me which one to use for checkin.
Sorry, no near venues found with the name \'%1$s\'
I\'m sorry, but I was not able to find your current location. Plase try again later.
Cannot connect due an incompatible Foursquare app version installed. To solve this problem, try to update Foursquare app.
Foursquare authentication error occurred while connectig. Error code: %1$s
Foursquare internal error occurred while connectig. Error message: %1$s
Unexpected error occurred while connectig. Error message: %1$s
Foursquare already connected. To force re-connection, press the button below.
No account connected to Foursquare. Please connect it using the button below
Connect to Foursquare
Open Contact
open contact, open contact [contact] or open contact [contact] + [phone label]

This action allows to open a contact detail screen.
 
 Examples:
 "open contact Paul"
 "open contact George mobule""
the contact name
Paul
Please, tell me the name of the contact to open.
I\'m sorry, but I didn\'t found a valid contact with the name \"%1$s\".
Which contact should I need to open?
Weather
check the weather for [place name]

Allows to check for the weather.
 
 Examples:
 "check the weather for Rome"
The place to check
Rome
Date for weather forecast
tomorrow
en
I\'m sorry, but I can\'t check weather forecast farther than 5 days since now like on %1$te %1$tB %1$tY
I\'m sorry, but I can\'t check weather forecast in the past like on %1$te %1$tB %1$tY
Sorry, in order to check the weather, you need to enable the GPS.
Sorry, an error occurred while performing the weather command. Action aborted.
Which place do you want to check?
Sorry, no places found with the name \'%1$s\'
I\'m sorry, but I was not able to find your current location. Plase try again later.
Forecast weather for today in %1$s is: %2$s. Weather data provided by World Weather Online.
Forecast weather for tomorrow in %1$s is: %2$s. Weather data provided by World Weather Online.
Forecast weather on %1$te %1$tB %1$tY in %2$s is: %3$s. Weather data provided by World Weather Online.

string-array.name: action_weather_codes
string-array.item: 395|moderate or heavy snow in area with thunder
392|patchy light snow in area with thunder
389|moderate or heavy rain in area with thunder
386|patchy light rain in area with thunder
377|moderate or heavy showers of ice pellets

resources.string: Audio - Volume up
raise volume

Raise music, system and alarm volumes.
 
 Examples:
 "raise volume"
Audio - Volume down
lower volume

Lower music, system and alarm volumes.
 
 Examples:
 "lower volume"
Audio - Set volume level
set volume to [volume level]

Set music, system and alarm volumes to a value from 0 (minimum) to 100 (maximum).
 
 Examples:
 "set volume to 90"
The volume level (from 0 to 100)
Tell me the level from 0 to 100.
Audio - Set volume to max
volume max

Set music, system and alarm volumes to maximum.
 
 Examples:
 "Volume max"
Audio - Set profile
set audio profile to [profile]

Set the audio profile to normal, silent or vibrate.
 
 Examples:
 "set silent profile"
 "enable normal profile"
 "set audio profile to vibrate"
The profile to set among normal, silent and vibrate
normal
Tell me the audio profile to set.
silent
vibrate
normal
Volume changed
Profile set
